title: The effective action of W_3-gravity
abstract: A new method for integrating anomalous Ward identities and finding the effective action is proposed. Two-dimensional supergravity and $W_3$-gravity are used as examples to demonstrate its potential. An operator is introduced that associates each physical quantity with a Ward identity, i.e., a quantity that is transformed without anomalous terms and can be nullified in a consistent manner. A covariant form of the action for matter field interacting with a gravitational and $W_3$-gravitational background is proposed.
